thread.title: Claude Julien: We Don’t Have The Skill Level To Get Away With Average Games
thread.title_full: Claude Julien: We Don’t Have The Skill Level To Get Away With Average Games

title: Claude Julien: We Don’t Have The Skill Level To Get Away With Average Games
text:
7:41PM 343 Tweet 
Claude Julien did not mince words Sunday following his team’s 5-1 loss to the Pittsburgh Penguins. 
Julien expressed his frustrations with his Boston Bruins’ performance and vocalized that the team does not possess the talent level to get away with mediocre play. 
To hear what else the coach had to say, check out the clip from “Bruins Overtime Live” above. 
Thumbnail photo via Charles LeClaire/USA TODAY Sports Images More Stories
